original_text: He openeth also their ear to discipline, and commandeth that they return from iniquity.
korean_text: 그들의 귀를 열어 교훈을 듣게 하시며 명하여 죄악에서 돌이키게 하시나니

sentences.original_text: He openeth also their ear to discipline,
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 그들의 귀를 훈계를 위해 열어주시고,

sentences.original_text: and commandeth that they return from iniquity.
